document_data.name: Street of Lanterns
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Lanterns''' was a murky, refuse-lined road in an unsavory part of the Old City section of [[Iriaebor]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This road intersected with the [[Street of Jewels]].<ref>
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Prince and Pauper]], a gambling establishment.
document_data.Inhabitants: It was not uncommon to find [[prostitute|painted ladies]] soliciting favors for coin along this street,<ref> nor [[rat]]s scurrying among its trash-lined gutters.
